int port::owner

This is an index into process_table.

The index corresponds to the process that owns this thread.

Definition at line 14 of file sync.h.

Referenced by allocate_port(), and initialize_ports().

int port::receiver

The identity of a thread which is blocked on a receive opereation.

Set to -1 if no thread is receiving.
